column4: i use  Intel Corporation 82852/855GM Integrated Graphics Device (rev 02) i need
drivers for it
you dont. Xorg already has the i810 driver, which is sufficient for i855GM
just configure your Xorg to use the right driver (i810)
my grafx dont display properly
i use the i810 driver only
in which way?
i810 driver also need AGP support in the kernel at higher resolutions

i am on a laptop
so help me out with the commands
look at /var/log/Xorg.0.log and search for messages about AGP
if AGP is not supported for your board, then you're out of luck

look at /var/log/Xorg.0.log and search for messages about AGP
